name: BOMB BOMB BOOM
description:
Help the snails to get home safe

FEATURES:

-10 rounds

-Addictive and fun !

-Mouse controlled

-Infinite replayability

-1 bit pixel art

-This game can be finished in a lunch time break (10 min)

CONTROLLER: YOU NEED A MOUSE ! ! ! :) :) :)

CONTROLS:

Move (x, y): Mouse position

Shoot: Left Click

ESC: Quit the game

START: Enter, Space, Mouse left Click

PLATFORMS: Windows, Mac

*More info about my work: Check out the Presskit

WARNING: 

-The game has lots of flashing/screenshake elements which may be sensitive for some people. "People with photosensitive epilepsy may have seizures triggered by displays that flicker, flash, or blink." Source: Epilepsy.org

-After playing for a while, please take a break ! Your hand and eyes will appreciate that :)
